thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Such a perfect place
thread.title_full: Such a perfect place - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Dalitshilo
title: Such a perfect place
text:
Thank you IQ Hotel staff and managment for a lovely and wonderful 6 nights saty.
Thank you for upgrading our room due to our anneversery. Thank you for all the kind smiles at the dinning room at breakfast, at the lounge bar at night, everytime we passed the front desk. Thank you for having us. Thank you thank you thank you.
I found your hotel here on tripadvisor and i knew we must reserve a room. So I insisted with my travel agent. We were not sorry.
The staff, the breakfast, the lounge, the room, the tub, the balcony.
Everything was perfect.
Thank you for a lovely, perfect and probably not last stay!
Kfir &Dalit.
